professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with expertise in SQL Server Replication, Log Shipping, Performance Tuning, Backup/Recovery, and Security Management. Skilled in Data Modeling, Query Optimization, and Report Development using SSRS and Power BI.

key_responsibilities: Provided database administration and management for SQL Server environments.
Monitored server performance and resolved issues related to locks
Managed large-scale database replication and clustering solutions.
Optimized database performance using SQL Profiler and Database Tuning Advisor.
Implemented security policies and performed regular audits to meet SLA standards.
Developed and maintained E-R diagrams and data models for various applications.
Performed backward and forward engineering tasks to support database migrations.
